name: DUNGEON PARTY (itch) (TaliOS)
description:
Game

Progress through the game board by rolling a die. Each tile you land on has a different meaning:

  • Red tiles will bring you to an action challenge, where you have to either defeat all the enemies or collect all the things.
  • Green tiles give you some sort of upgrade or change your character.
  • Other tiles do... other things!

The game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, the theme was "Roll of the dice".

Controls

On the board, click the button to roll the dice and advance. You can move the camera with WASD when the character is not moving. When the path splits, use WASD to select which direction to follow.

During a challenge screen, use WASD to move, and the left mouse click to act.

Press F at any time to go fullscreen.

Assets used
  • All of the sprites were made by Kenney: https://kenney.nl/
  • The music was made by Wolfgang on OGA: https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-cave-loop
